description: This source file defines a utility singleton object 'CurrencyUtils' that provides methods to format currency values (BigDecimal, Double, Long) into localized Brazilian Real (BRL) currency strings using pt-BR locale. It handles nulls gracefully and ensures thread safety by creating a new formatter instance for each call.

classes.name: CurrencyUtils
classes.description: A singleton object providing static methods for formatting currency values in BRL. It handles various numeric types and locale-specific formatting, ensuring thread safety.

methods.name: newFormatter
methods.description: Creates a new NumberFormat instance configured for pt-BR locale and BRL currency, ensuring thread safety.

methods.name: formatBRL
methods.description: Overloaded methods that format BigDecimal, Double, or Long amounts into BRL currency strings according to pt-BR locale conventions. They handle null inputs by defaulting to zero.
